title-part.text: MAKING FORGED OR PRESSED PRODUCTS, e.g. HORSE-SHOES, RIVETS, BOLTS, WHEELS

reference.text: making particular articles by working sheet metal without essentially removing material B21D; processing wire B21F; making pins, needles or nails B21G; making particular articles by rolling B21H; forging machines, pressing machines, hammering machines, in general B21J; making chain B21L; plating B23K

note.note-paragraph: This subclass includes only forging, pressing, or hammering operations which are specially adapted for use in the manufacture of particular objects and which, sor far as the invention is concerned, are not combined with any different metal-working operation unless the latter is a subsidiary operation performed in the same machine.

title-part.text: Making particular articles by forging, pressing, or hammering
balls, rolls, or rollers, e.g. for bearings
parts of pipe or hose couplings
poppet valves, e.g. for internal-combustion engines
housings or supporting parts, e.g. axle housings, engine mountings

reference.text: making screw-thread B21K1/56; making U-bolts B21K1/74

CPC-specific-text.text: Heading machines with an oscillating die block

title-part.text: Machines working with hammers, e.g. beating in a radial direction, for forming heads
Trimming or shearing formed heads, e.g. working with dies
double-ended, e.g. with heads on both ends
special rivets, e.g. with electrical contacts
of special shape, e.g. self-locking nuts, wing nuts
hooks, e.g. crane hooks, railway track spikes
forked members or members with two or more limbs, e.g. U-bolts, anchors
elements not mentioned in one of the preceding groups

CPC-specific-text.text: Coupling members for conveying mechanical motion, e.g. universal joints

title-part.text: Making engine or like machine parts not covered by sub-groups of B21K1/00
Making tools or tool parts, e.g. pliers
drilling-tools or other for making or working on holes
Making working faces of dies, either recessed or outstanding
base plates for rails, e.g. chairs
parts for locomotives or vehicles, e.g. frames, underframes
Making garden tools or the like
Making locksmiths` goods, e.g. handles for cases
metal attachments for footwear, e.g. wearresisting plates
Making hollow articles not covered by a single preceding sub-group

reference.text: essentially from sheet-metal or uniform thin-walled tubes B21D, e.g. B21D41/00, B21D51/00

title-part.text: Producing blanks in the shape of discs or cups as semifinished articles for making hollow articles, e.g. to be deep-drawn or extruded
Shaping thin-walled hollow articles, e.g. cartridges
Shaping thick-walled hollow articles, e.g. projectiles
Shaping hollow articles with different cross-section in longitudinal direction, e.g. nozzles, spark-plugs
cone-shaped or bell-shaped articles, e.g. insulator caps
Shaping end portions of hollow articles
closed or substantially-closed ends, e.g. cartridge bottoms
Remodelling hollow bodies with respect to the shape of the cross-section
members of endless tracks, e.g. track guides, shoes

reference.text: B21K1/28 takes precedence; flanging tubes B21D

title-part.text: Uniting components to form integral members, e.g. turbine wheels and shafts, caulks with inserts, with or without shaping of the components

reference.text: uniting by interference- or press-fitting B23P11/02, B21K19/02
B21J15/027 takes precedence; friction heat forging per se B21J5/063

title-part.text: Handling devices, e.g. for feeding, aligning, discharging, Cutting-off means
Feeding devices for rods, wire, or strips
Arrangements for heating or cooling during processing

reference.text: for preparing metal stock to be forged or pressed B21J1/06; heating equipment per se, see the appropriate classes, e.g. H05B

title-part.text: Control devices specially adapted for positioning tool carriers
